# tf.keras.backend.reverse

Reverse a tensor along the specified axes.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/reverse"><code>tf.compat.v1.keras.backend.reverse</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/reverse"><code>tf.compat.v2.keras.backend.reverse</code></a>


``` python
tf.keras.backend.reverse(
    x,
    axes
)
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Arguments:


* <b>`x`</b>: Tensor to reverse.
* <b>`axes`</b>: Integer or iterable of integers.
    Axes to reverse.


#### Returns:

A tensor.
